question: Please clear it to me weather iam allowed to read khuran or any surah on the internet or computer while my periods.
answer:
QUESTION
Assalam alykum wa rahmatullahi wa barakathu Dear brother.. Please clear it to me weather iam allowed to read khuran or any surah on the internet or computer while my periods.. Is it allowed to do make up in islam.. And also I want to know that we have nafl prayer after sunrise wat is the exact timing to pray that salat and wat niyat do we have to make to read this salat . Are there any other nafl salat in the day . if yes pls tel me the timings and the way to pray.. Thank you allah hafiz
ANSWER


Share:
1. It is not permissible for a female in the state of menses to recite the Qur?aan in any way. That includes reciting through the computer or internet.

2. It is permissible for a female to do make up only for her husband.

3. Refer attached.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
